DOC.brief_summary: This study will test the palatability of several different CP-690,550 oral preparations in trained product tester healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Taste Of Different Oral Liquid Preparations Of CP-690,550 In Trained Adult Product Testers
DOC.detailed_description: To develop a palatable pediatric oral solution dosage form of CP-690,550.
DOC.criteria: Trained healthy nonpregnant product testers, age 1875 Severe acute or chronic medical conditions, including hepatitis or tuberculosis infections or clinically significant laboratory abnormalities.
DOC.keyword: taste study open label investigational drug oral therapy
